pages.title: About this template

content.text: We created this template for your community.
Below is a summary of the starting settings that come along with the
template. You can easily change the setup or further customize this space for your community by clicking and exploring
Every member that joins your space will receive the Default role. A default member will have:
Until changed by an Admin, a member with the Default role will be able to:
Create a post in any forum category
Here are a couple of custom roles to get you started but feel free to create more or import from Discord, CollabLand, or Guild.
Assign this role to a member to help moderate your space. In addition to default permissions, a user with the Moderator role will be able to:
Moderate and access all Forum categories
The Moderator role is assigned as the Reviewer in all of the preset proposal templates.
allows a member to contribute new content to your space. In addition to default permissions, a user with the Super Fan role will be able to:
. Default members will have Post, Vote,
& Comment access to all categories unless otherwise designated below.

pages.contentText: Attention, Admins! We created this template for your community. Below is a summary of the starting settings that come along with the Creator template. You can easily change the setup or further customize this space for your community by clicking and exploring ‚öôÔ∏è Settings in the side bar.üì´ NotificationsIn-app notifications are ENABLED for:‚úÖ Rewards‚úÖ Proposals‚úÖ Pollsüë§ Default Role PermissionsEvery member that joins your space will receive the Default role. A default member will have:üëÄ VIEW only access to   and subpages.Until changed by an Admin, a member with the Default role will be able to:Create a proposalCreate a post in any forum categoryüé© Custom RolesHere are a couple of custom roles to get you started but feel free to create more or import from Discord, CollabLand, or Guild.ModeratorAssign this role to a member to help moderate your space. In addition to default permissions, a user with the Moderator role will be able to:Create new pages and delete any pageCreate new rewards and delete any rewardDelete and archive any proposalModerate and access all Forum categoriesThe Moderator role is assigned as the Reviewer in all of the preset proposal templates.Super FanThe Super Fan role allows a member to contribute new content to your space. In addition to default permissions, a user with the Super Fan role will be able to:Create new pagesüìù Proposal TemplatesYou will start with these 4 templates:PartnershipsEducationCommunityArt Directionüí¨ Forum CategoriesYou will start with these 9 forum categories. Default members will have Post, Vote, & Comment access to all categories unless otherwise designated below.AMAAnnouncements (Vote & Comment only)Events (Vote & Comment only)GeneralFan CreationsFandomsMerch & CollectiblesTeasers (Vote & Comment only)Support & Feedback

and embed the charts and tables in CharmVerse by typing

Embed NFTs by clicking on the prompts below or typing /nftAdd a bookmark to your OpenSea collection analytics by typing /bookmarkYou can build an analytics dashboard for your collection using Dune and embed the charts and tables in CharmVerse by typing /dune. children.title: Exclusive Content

content.text: You can restrict access to this page and subpages using
You can choose to add a Private link or a Token Gate
role to the link you create. Members who join your space through this link will be assigned the attached role.
Share invite link with members who should have access to the exclusive content on this page and subpages.
in the upper right corner of this page
your exclusive access role with the desired permissions level

children.contentText: You can restrict access to this page and subpages using role-based access control.  1. Create a role for exclusive accessClick Settings in the left side menuClick Roles & Permissions, then Add a role 2. Build an invite link and include roleClick Invite Members in the left side menuClick AddYou can choose to add a Private link or a Token GateAttach exclusive access role to the link you create. Members who join your space through this link will be assigned the attached role.Share invite link with members who should have access to the exclusive content on this page and subpages. 3. Set page permissionsClick Share in the upper right corner of this pageRemove access from EveryoneInvite your exclusive access role with the desired permissions level

pages.title: Community

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the community project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed project aims to enhance engagement, inclusivity, and collaboration within the NFT community.]
[Outline plans for organizing community events, such as meetups, webinars, or virtual gatherings.]
[Detail initiatives to improve or establish community forums for discussions and knowledge sharing.]
[Describe plans for collaborating with other NFT communities or related groups.]
[Detail any potential partnerships that can strengthen the community ecosystem.]
[Outline plans for onboarding new community members, including educational resources and support.]
[Describe strategies for increasing engagement on social media platforms and reaching a broader audience.]
[Outline initiatives to ensure inclusivity, diversity, and representation within the community.]
[Detail plans for providing support and content in multiple languages, if applicable.]
[Explain the role of the community in decision-making processes and governance initiatives.]
[Detail how community feedback will be collected and considered for project improvements.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the community project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, including community managers, moderators, or any other relevant roles.]
[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for community engagement.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of community growth, such as new members, active participants, and engagement rates.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed community initiatives.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Community proposal.]

pages.contentText: OverviewProject Name: [Enter Project Name]Category: CommunitySubmitted By: [Your Name or Team Name]Contact Information: [Your Email Address] [Your Phone Number]Project DescriptionObjective: [Provide a brief overview of the community project's goals and objectives.]Enhancing Community Engagement: [Explain how the proposed project aims to enhance engagement, inclusivity, and collaboration within the NFT community.]Project ComponentsCommunity Events: [Outline plans for organizing community events, such as meetups, webinars, or virtual gatherings.]Forums and Discussions: [Detail initiatives to improve or establish community forums for discussions and knowledge sharing.]Collaboration and PartnershipsCollaborations with Other Communities: [Describe plans for collaborating with other NFT communities or related groups.]Strategic Partnerships: [Detail any potential partnerships that can strengthen the community ecosystem.]Community OutreachOnboarding Initiatives: [Outline plans for onboarding new community members, including educational resources and support.]Social Media Engagement: [Describe strategies for increasing engagement on social media platforms and reaching a broader audience.]Inclusivity and DiversityInclusivity Programs: [Outline initiatives to ensure inclusivity, diversity, and representation within the community.]Language Support: [Detail plans for providing support and content in multiple languages, if applicable.]Governance and Decision-MakingCommunity Governance: [Explain the role of the community in decision-making processes and governance initiatives.]Feedback Mechanism: [Detail how community feedback will be collected and considered for project improvements.]TimelineStart Date: [Enter the proposed start date of the community project.]End Date: [Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]Resources NeededHuman Resources: [List the team members or roles required for the project, including community managers, moderators, or any other relevant roles.]Materials/Tools: [Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for community engagement.]Evaluation and Success MetricsCommunity Growth: [List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of community growth, such as new members, active participants, and engagement rates.]Feedback and Improvement: [Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]ApprovalApproval Deadline: [Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]Community Feedback: [Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed community initiatives.]Additional Notes[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Community proposal.]

pages.title: Education

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the educational project's goals and objectives.]
[Specify the target audience, such as NFT enthusiasts, beginners, or a specific segment within the community.]
[Specify if the project involves written guides, video tutorials, webinars, workshops, or any other format.]
[List the specific topics or subjects that the educational resources will cover.]
[Specify the format of the educational content ‚Äì text, video, audio, interactive, etc.]
[Indicate where the educational content will be accessible, such as community forums, a dedicated website, social media, or other platforms.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, if applicable.]
[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for the project.]
[Provide an estimated budget breakdown for any expenses associated with the project.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the project, such as engagement metrics, feedback, or completion rates.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Education and Resources proposal.]

pages.contentText: Project DescriptionObjective: [Provide a brief overview of the educational project's goals and objectives.]Target Audience: [Specify the target audience, such as NFT enthusiasts, beginners, or a specific segment within the community.]Project DetailsContent Type: [Specify if the project involves written guides, video tutorials, webinars, workshops, or any other format.]Topics Covered: [List the specific topics or subjects that the educational resources will cover.]Format: [Specify the format of the educational content ‚Äì text, video, audio, interactive, etc.]Delivery Platforms: [Indicate where the educational content will be accessible, such as community forums, a dedicated website, social media, or other platforms.]TimelineStart Date: [Enter the proposed start date of the project.]End Date: [Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]Resources NeededHuman Resources: [List the team members or roles required for the project, if applicable.]Materials/Tools: [Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for the project.]Budget: [Provide an estimated budget breakdown for any expenses associated with the project.]Evaluation and Success MetricsKey Performance Indicators (KPIs): [List the metrics that will be used to measure the success of the project, such as engagement metrics, feedback, or completion rates.]Feedback and Improvement: [Outline a plan for collecting feedback and making improvements based on community input.]Additional Notes[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Education and Resources proposal.]

pages.title: Art Direction

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the art direction project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed art direction aligns with the overall theme, vision, and identity of the NFT community.]
[Describe the visual elements you plan to incorporate, such as color schemes, typography, and overall design aesthetics.]
[Explain how the art direction will contribute to storytelling within the NFT community, if applicable.]
[Outline plans for developing or refining the community's visual brand, including logos, banners, and other brand assets.]
[If applicable, detail plans for designing NFT collections, including themes, rarity levels, and overall artistic approach.]
[Detail plans for collaborating with artists within the community or external artists, if applicable.]
[Describe how the community will be involved in the decision-making process regarding art direction.]
[Specify the design principles and guidelines that will be followed in creating visual content for the community.]
[Ensure consistency in visual elements across various platforms, including social media, websites, and other community spaces.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the art direction project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, including designers, artists, or any other relevant roles.]
[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for the project.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback on the art direction, including surveys or community forums.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the visual impact of the art direction on the community.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed art direction.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Art Direction proposal.]

pages.title: Partnerships

content.text: [Provide a brief overview of the partnership and/or collaboration project's goals and objectives.]
[Explain how the proposed project aims to strengthen the NFT community ecosystem through strategic partnerships.]
[Outline the process for identifying and selecting potential partners within and outside the NFT space.]
[Detail the specific collaborative initiatives or projects that will result from the proposed partnerships.]
[Specify the criteria used to ensure that potential partners align with the values and goals of the NFT community.]
[Explain how partnerships will provide mutual benefits to both the NFT community and the partner organizations.]
[Describe how the community will be involved in the decision-making process regarding partnerships and collaborations.]
[Outline measures to ensure transparency in the partnership selection process.]
[Detail plans for partnerships that involve technology integration or collaboration on technical projects.]
[Describe strategies for marketing and promotional activities resulting from partnerships.]
[Explain how resources, expertise, or knowledge will be shared between the NFT community and partner organizations.]
[Detail plans for cross-promotional activities to enhance visibility for both parties.]
[Enter the proposed start date of the partnerships and collaborations project.]
[Enter the proposed end date or duration of the project.]
[List the team members or roles required for the project, including partnership managers or coordinators.]
[Specify any specific materials, tools, or software needed for managing partnerships.]
[List the metrics that will be used to measure the success and impact of the partnerships and collaborations.]
[Outline a plan for collecting feedback on partnerships and making adjustments based on community input.]
[Specify the deadline for community feedback or approval.]
[Outline the process for community members to provide feedback or suggestions on the proposed partnerships and collaborations.]
[Include any additional information, notes, or considerations relevant to the Partnerships & Collaborations proposal.]

posts.title: Get the conversation started!

content.text: It is easy to start a conversation here, in CharmVerse! Simply click
from the dropdown menu. Make sure to title your post because you won't be able to publish it without one.
When creating a post, you have access to most of the CharmEditor's cool features.
text to style, format, or add a link
to bring up a menu of available blocks. Insert an image or video, embed a tweet or NFT, and more.
-mention a member, role, or even a page to add a useful link
It is also easy to join a conversation! Reply or add your thoughts below a post. The
comments will be threaded and easy to follow. And if you think a post is really amazing, don't forget to upvote

posts.contentText: üëã Welcome to your CharmVerse Forum!It is easy to start a conversation here, in CharmVerse! Simply click [Create Post] and choose a Category from the dropdown menu. Make sure to title your post because you won't be able to publish it without one.When creating a post, you have access to most of the CharmEditor's cool features.Highlight text to style, format, or add a linkType / to bring up a menu of available blocks. Insert an image or video, embed a tweet or NFT, and more.@-mention a member, role, or even a page to add a useful linkIt is also easy to join a conversation! Reply or add your thoughts below a post. The üí¨ comments will be threaded and easy to follow. And if you think a post is really amazing, don't forget to upvote ‚¨ÜÔ∏è .
